definition: a load on one's mind/worry/CL:宗[zong1],樁|桩[zhuang1]
He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , bu4 pa4 gui3 qiao1 men2
containing_words.word: 不做虧心事，不怕鬼敲門

definition: He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: ping2 sheng1 bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , ban4 ye4 qiao1 men2 xin1 bu4 jing1
containing_words.word: 平生不做虧心事，半夜敲門心不驚

sentences.english: The rotten heart to water, dust to be a disappearing eyes.
sentences.chinese: 把發黴的心事交給流水，向遠去的塵埃行個注目禮。

sentences.english: John seemed to be off his feed, he did not joke and laugh with the others.
sentences.chinese: 約翰似乎有心事，他不跟別人說說笑笑。

sentences.english: I couldn't go to sleep without getting something off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 我假如不將心事一吐爲快就睡不着。

sentences.english: When Chou Chin heard Chin You-yu telling his sad story, he cried even harder.
sentences.chinese: 周進見姊夫說中他的心事，越發號啕大哭。

sentences.english: You gave me something to eat, now tell me what ails you.
sentences.chinese: 您已給了我喫的，現在把您的心事告訴我。

sentences.english: She has experienced too many sad-nesses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年她經歷了太多的傷心事。

sentences.english: Open your mouth and ask if you think something is bothering your spouse.
sentences.chinese: 如果你覺得你的愛人有什麼煩心事，那就開口問問他。

sentences.english: Gaps on the heart line suggest the person has known heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 情感線上的縫隙暗示這個人曾有過的傷心事。

sentences.english: I can see that you have something weighs heavily on your mind.
sentences.chinese: 他最近看起來心事重重的。你知道他有什麼心事嗎？

sentences.english: I can see that you have something weighs heavily on your mind.
sentences.chinese: 他最近看起來心事重重的。你知道他有什麼心事嗎？

sentences.english: The wife wept out her grief to her husband.
sentences.chinese: 妻子向丈夫哭訴自己的傷心事。

sentences.english: Troubled linger didnt come home on spring flowers, small qian to comfort.
sentences.chinese: 春花心事重重，流連在外沒有回家，小倩前來安慰。

sentences.english: His taking to drugs was a great grief to his parents.
sentences.chinese: 他的吸毒成癮是他父母親一大傷心事。

sentences.english: The old woman sat silent, as if care were pressing on her mind.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘坐着不開口，好像有什麼心事壓在她心頭似的。
卻任心事滿園，亦捻花不語。

definition: to say everything (that is on one's mind)
(to express one's) true feelings/what is on one's mind/secret mind
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
